name: Titanium.App.Windows
summary: Windows specific app capabilities. All properties, methods and events in this namespace will only work on Windows devices.

deprecated.notes: As of Titanium 9.0.0, building Windows apps is no longer supported.

constants.name: EXTENDED_EXECUTION_REASON_LOCATION_TRACKING
constants.summary: To support location tracking for the background execution request.

constants.name: EXTENDED_EXECUTION_REASON_SAVING_DATA
constants.summary: To save data for the background execution request.

constants.name: EXTENDED_EXECUTION_REASON_UNSPECIFIED
constants.summary: No reason specified for the background execution request.

constants.name: EXTENDED_EXECUTION_REVOKED_REASON_RESUMED
constants.summary: Background execution is revoked because app is resumed.

constants.name: EXTENDED_EXECUTION_REVOKED_REASON_SYSTEM_POLICY
constants.summary: Background execution is revoked due to system policy.
